titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Statistics, Yale University, Records
Department of Statistics, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:53

did.unittitle: Department of Statistics, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of subject, student and personnel files concerning the activities and operations of the Yale Department of Statistics. Also included are videotapes of the department's celebration of its 25th anniversary and the 70th birthday of Francis J. Anscombe.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic departments and programs of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See inventory for details. Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Statistics, Yale University, Records (RU 144). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of subject, student and personnel files concerning the activities and operations of the Yale Department of Statistics. Also included are videotapes of the department's celebration of its 25th anniversary and the 70th birthday of Francis J. Anscombe.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy of non-commercially produced items for their personal use should consult the ordering reproductions information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.
